param.label: Cores

param.help: Advanced usage (tool development and QA) only, use '0' for default.

param.label: Time Limit
param.name: time
param.help: Maximum job time in hours, ('walltime' value). Max of 24 for Galaxy cluster, 2 for test partitions. Shorter limit = runs sooner.

param.label: [Galaxy Tool Development] CPUs
param.name: team_cpus
param.help: Use '0' for default. If more cores are chosen than available on the selected compute resource, the value will be capped. Option ignored for non-developer users.

param.label: [Galaxy Tool Development] Memory (GB)
param.name: team_memory
param.help: Use '0' for default. If more memory is chosen than available on the selected compute resource, the value will be capped. Option ignored for non-developer users.
